name: Aarold & Me 2016
description:
Graduation Video Game 2016
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Aarold is a super-powerful warrior tired of saving the kingdom over and over again. Aware of the player's control, he will pick self-imposed constraints to make his quest more exciting.

Platform: PC / Engine: Unity 5
Number of players: 1

Producer : Mathilde KALLENBRUNN
Game Design : Matéo ROGÉ and Lou-André TRILLOT
Game Art : Marine COIFFARD, Dylan EURLINGS and Valeriane PARMENTIER
Game Design & Programming : Damien REBELO DA COSTA
Game Programming : Lucas MORANCE
Music & Sound Design : Franck RABINEAU
